tspan.tspan: Thank you for buying an S2 WiFi Nugget kit! Your purchase
support the open-source community, and helps us
produce free educational resources and content.
While the ESP32S2 doesn't support WiFi hacking yet, you can
still gather reconnaissance using this CircuitPython script:
- but stay posted as we continue to
implement new features! The S2 Nugget also supports HID
attacks, and you can check out an example here:
is perfect for beginners looking to get started
with the basics of coding, and anyone looking to interface with
hardware / sensors on the fly since it doesn't need to be
compiled. To get started coding in CircuitPython, check out

text.tspan: our installation guide at https://bit.ly/3FUgQIq and check out

tspan.tspan: If you want to get started with WiFi hacking, creating an IOT
device, or writing more complex /permanent code to interface
(a C based language) is better for this.
Check out our Arduino quickstart guide at
The S2 WiFi Nugget is a beginner-friendly platform for learning
hardware design and programming concepts, and supports
through Arduino and CircuitPython. This platform
